name: Claire's Cruisin' Cafe
description:
Set off on a cross-country journey to feed the famished masses!

Guide an aspiring super chef named Claire as she serves her customers a variety of haute cuisine from her suped up food truck. As you help Claire and her crew race to keep up with demand, you'll perform tasks ranging from prepping dishes to taking photos of satisfied guests. The faster you work and the happier your patrons, the bigger your tip!

Between each fast-paced level, you'll be able to spend your earnings on upgrades for your eateries and watch a humorous story about Claire's misadventures with an big-headed competitor and the identity of a mysterious food critic unfold.

Packed with lively characters, addictive gameplay and tons of bonus materials, Claire's Cruisin' Cafe will satisfying your craving for fun even as it leaves you hungry for more!

GAME FEATURES:

• 66 fast-paced levels
• Mini matching game
• Five upgradable restaurants
• Point-and-click controls
• In-game tutorial
• Desktop wallpapers
• Downloadable soundtrack
• Character stories
• Player rewards
